ObjectiveDescription: All people are safe and feel safe regardless of address.
Residents live healthy lifestyles and make informed choices.  They have access to excellent, comprehensive services for health, wellness and recreation.

Our pre-K through 12 schools and students are the pride of our community and are nationally recognized for excellence.  All education and training programs are dynamic, provide accessible paths to fulfilling careers, and are highly valued by our citizens and employers.

The region  has a skilled and sought-after workforce - enabling all families to improve their standard of living.  Our people are employed and per capita income is above the national average.

As a hub of ideas and innovation, we nurture, grow and attract world-class industries and employers. We are recognized for leadership in advanced manufacturing, logistics and agribusiness.
We take a purposeful, transparent, and results-oriented approach to planning for growth and renewal.

All residents in the Rockford region see the community with new eyes.  They feel proud of where they live, have confidence in the future and inspire others to conduct their lives in a way that promotes our region from within.
Our local governments and not-for-profits are effective and properly supported and aligned with the community vision.
Our commitment to quality drives all community activities - delivering superior infrastructure, services and attractions.
Our transportation and communication systems are robust and accessible.  They efficiently connect people to opportunities and amenities within and beyond our area.
Strong, engaged individuals and families are the foundation of vibrant neighborhoods throughout the region.  Neighborhoods are interconnected, adding to our sense of unity.
Our leaders are visionary, effective, respected and supported. They engage our youth and actively develop next-generation leaders.
Diverse forms of creative expression and recreation flourish, and lead to self-fulfillment and national acclaim.
Our community is unified.  We celebrate our diversity, take pride in our individual and collective accomplishments and live our shared values.

The organization designing the Cultural Plan for Rockford in partnership with the RACV, and the Rockford Park Distrik will develop and imlent a comprehensive marekting plan to pulicize and promote Rockford and the Rockford region's arts, recreation and cultural events, opportunities, and assets to local, state, national, and global audiences.
Our community works together to prevent and stop domestic violence.
Law enforcement agencies partner together to create a safe and secure community.
Our community develops a sense of belonging and self-worth in our youth.
Our community takes responsibility for everyone’s safety.

ObjectiveName: Living the Brand - Living the Values
ObjectiveDescription: Our community commits to living our Shared Values.

ObjectiveName: Living the Brand - Live the Brand Now
ObjectiveDescription: Our community shares responsibility for looking, acting, and communicating like the region we want to be.
Our community embraces and consistently promotes ALL the opportunities provided by the region’s amenities and attributes
Our community will deliver superior quality by instilling local, national and international standards
Our community will deliver superior quality by creating a standard where one does not exist

UNIFIED WORKFORCE DEVELOPMENT NETWORK:
A partnership of employers and trainers consolidates and coordinates a framework for training through a unified regional workforce network

INNOVATION ECOSYSTEM:
Public and private collaboration foster a world-class business development ecosystem to launch innovation and entrepreneurship.

NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED LEADERSHIP INDUSTRY CLUSTERS:
Dominant industry clusters command national recognition: they leverage adjacent urban center assets and develop high performing supply chains locally.

STIMULATING INCOME & JOB GROWTH:
Private businesses, with the support of public entities stimulate job growth using career ladders..

ATTRACTING BUSINESSES REGIONALLY:
Economic development partners collaborate regionally for business retention, expansion and attraction.

From our backyards to the world stage we facilitate and implement best practices in compelling and genuine communication for and among all residents, resulting in shared community pride and a positive image and reputation for the region.
Establish a common agenda - Information and resources are shared through open and frequent communication in a state of optimum effectiveness, collaboration, and funding.
Set metrics - The Rockford Region, working collaboratively and cooperatively, ensures effective and efficient delivery of services.

Create accountability - The Rockford region works together for the common good to achieve the community vision and maintains accountability and alignment through financial and public pressure for compliance.

Establish trust in community planning by elevating participation to a partnership level, where representatives of governing organizations and people from all segments of the community jointly plan, design, share work, responsibilities, accountabilities and decision-making.
Achieve full participation in governmental elections, where all members of the community vote and elect leaders that support the community’s strategies and plans.

Reach every member of the community to gain participation in planning processes in their individual areas of interest, provide information on plan developments, and build commitments to achieve results.
Establish and embed proven implementation practices in our community plans that excite the community and enable the achievement of plan objectives within established timeframes.

Interstate Loop:The region can benefit from a more balanced land use distribution model, but key infrastructure such as an interstate loop are necessary. Regional leaders and key stakeholders will work diligently through RMAP to secure funding for this critical infrastructure. Jobs and economic development in the western half of the region can directly benefit from this additional roadway capacity and travel option. Moreover, industry clusters in freight and logistics can directly benefit from connections to the growing hub at RFD and the economic recovery zones that surround it..

The region can benefit from modernization and upgrades to the privately-owned rail network that not only create opportunities for growth, jobs and a better quality of life, but complement the existing momentum of renewal that is centered on transit-oriented-development in the urban core. This vision supports removal and cleaning of blighted brownfield areas with a new mix of retail, housing and office uses. The vision also supports the creation of passenger rail connections to Chicagoland, both inter-city and commuter, that complement rather than compete with freight interests. Regional leaders will have to work through RMAP to advance these efforts.

Public transit, sidewalks and paths for the region will become a true transportation option for all citizens, serving workplace, medical, shopping, fitness and entertainment trips at a high level. Regional leaders and key stakeholders will work diligently through RMAP and RMTD to secure funding for increased transit operations and infrastructure. The existing “fixed-route” bus network will transition to primarily a door-to-door operation using new technology and partnerships.
Provide an economically sustainable WiFi expandable infrastructure in the tri-city area by 2025 that caters to the needs of citizens and visitors.
Secure private/public (f)ISP to provide a fiber to the home/business network in the tri-city area with speeds of at least 10g or better by 2025.
Students, educators, and families are ready to fulfill their responsibilities.
Our business and civic organizations engage in partnerships with our schools for the success of all.
Our community overcomes barriers to learning by aligning support for the benefit of every student.
We are a community where healthy food choices are accessible to all and the easy choice.
We are a community of active living where all have access to recreational opportunities.
We have healthy social and emotional development for everyone at all stages of life.

ObjectiveDescription: Our community’s leaders align with the community's vision and values.

ObjectiveDescription: All youth are engaged in opportunities to discover and grow the leader within
Everyone Achieves: Our leaders will align to end Generational Poverty.
Leading with Vision & Purpose: Our community leaders will align with a sense of purpose.

Cultural Plan:The power of arts and culture to reshape lives, neighborhoods, and communities will be a driving force for social change as organizations and individuals create and align around a Cultural Plan.
Access: Residents of all ages and abilities will be exposed to, participate in, and have the opportunity to master their own chosen form of art or recreation..

Diversity: Arts and recreation opportunities will be as diverse as our region itself; All residents of the Rock River Valley will “see themselves” in the forms of arts and recreation activities offered in our community..
Physical Assets:Our region’s arts and recreation venues, physical assets, and natural resources amenities will be safe, modern, and utilized by both residents and tourists.

Marketing: An integrated marketing plan will publicize and promote the Rock River Valley’s arts, recreation, and cultural events, opportunities, and assets to local, state, national, and global audiences.
Infrastructure: The condition of all physical structures results in occupied, purposeful space that is beneficial to our community.
Resources: Neighborhoods will have access to resources and amenities that promote positive community environment.
Equality: Ensure that our communities honors and embraces diversity and the success of all people at all levels.
Uniqueness: Promote the vitality, community standards, and unique character of each of our neighborhoods.
Collaboration: Cultivate and foster collaborative partnerships that utilize the strengths of our residents and organizations to become a Top 25 community.
We have a shared community story.
We will deepen relationships by building bridges across the barriers that divide us.

The mission of Transform Rockford is to facilitate the Rockford region's transformation into a Top 25 Community
The community achieves the conditions described in its vision and impact statement

The community creates, implements and continually improves its strategic plan.

Goal:
Using the process framework provided, spoke teams develop community strategies and plans and facilitate their implementation to transform the Rockford region into a Top 25 community.

The community has a climate where transformation flourishes.

Goal:
The necessary environment and processes exist to allow for the effective creation and implementation of transformational community strategies and plans.
